sentences.sentence: Note that the teaser image shows a fireman holding a baby.
sentences.translation: 看看这幅图片，画着一个消防员举着一个婴儿。

sentences.sentence: A teaser is one way to advertise, and a homepage advertises too (even a website).
sentences.translation: 内容摘要就是广告的一种方式，而首页也是在做广告(甚至是一个网站)。

sentences.sentence: This data includes the node type, title, teaser, body, creator, and creation time.
sentences.translation: 这些数据包含节点类型、标题、摘要、主体、创建者和创建时间。
